title: 68 Perch an Investment Land for Sale in Homagama
details:
68 Perch an Investment Land for Sale in Homagama

 Less than 3 Km away from Homagama Junction.
 1.2 Km to Uduwana Junction.
 Within 5 Km radius of Techno City, Mahinda Rajapaksa Ground, Southern Highway, Multi model transport hub & NSBM Green University.
 25ft wide roadway.
 Pipe borne water & Single phase electricity are available.

LKR 400, 000 per perch
(Only Genuine Buyers accepted)
